relevant_findings.Patient 1: Polycethemia confirmed by blood volume measurement, first surgery at age 45 for right pheochromocytoma, second surgery at 59 for left para-aortic and right parailiac functional paraganglioma, non-functional duodenal somatostatinoma detected.
relevant_findings.Patient 2: Congenital polycythemia treated by phlebotomy since infancy, non-functional para-aortic paraganglioma detected at age 9.

changes_over_time.Patient 2: New highly vascularized tumors detected three years later, cranial vault lesion diagnosed as intraosseous hemangioma.
